data.persona: I live alone in a tent in the woods. I steal food from the townspeople and coal from the blacksmith. The village police can not find me to put me in jail.
data.description:
You are in the Hidden passage.
A rough, narrow passageway descends through the thick outer wall of the church. Stair-like stones lead downward into darkness.
There's a holy crown, a holy book, a sickle, and a tithe plate here.

You are carrying some meat and some coal, and wearing a cloak and a dark tunic.

data.short_motivation: I need the crown to get money
data.mid_motivation: I want to steal the holy crown today
data.long_motivation: I want to have money from the crown to build a house

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wear thief clothes that are dark in color

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go walk to the hidden passage where the holy crown is

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal the holy crown from where the holy crown is held

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go your tent in the woods

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give the holy crown to the person you are selling it to

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get money from the person you are selling to
